problem_names:
lemma liftablepI[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> x y. r x y \<Longrightarrow> r (f x) (f y)"
    shows "liftablep r f"

lemma liftablepE[elim]:
    assumes "liftablep r f"
    assumes "r x y"
    obtains "r (f x) (f y)"

lemma liftablep_rtranclp:
    assumes "liftablep r f"
    shows "liftablep r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* f"

lemma confluentpI[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> x y1 y2. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1 \<Longrightarrow> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2 \<Longrightarrow> \<exists> z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z"
    shows "confluentp r"

lemma confluentpE[elim]:
    assumes "confluentp r"
    assumes "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1" "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2"
    obtains z
    where "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z" "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z"

lemma confluentpI'[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> x y1 y2. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1 \<Longrightarrow> r x y2 \<Longrightarrow> \<exists> z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z"
    shows "confluentp r"

lemma transclp_eq_implies_confluent_imp:
    assumes "r1\<^sup>*\<^sup>* = r2\<^sup>*\<^sup>*"
    assumes "confluentp r1"
    shows "confluentp r2"

lemma transclp_eq_implies_confluent_eq:
    assumes "r1\<^sup>*\<^sup>* = r2\<^sup>*\<^sup>*"
    shows "confluentp r1 \<longleftrightarrow> confluentp r2"

lemma diamondpI[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> x y1 y2. r x y1 \<Longrightarrow> r x y2 \<Longrightarrow> \<exists> z. r y1 z \<and> r y2 z"
    shows "diamondp r"

lemma diamondpE[elim]:
    assumes "diamondp r"
    assumes "r x y1" "r x y2"
    obtains z
    where "r y1 z" "r y2 z"

lemma diamondp_implies_confluentp:
    assumes "diamondp r"
    shows "confluentp r"
translations: lemmas sym_rtranclp[intro] = sym_rtrancl[to_pred]

definition liftablep :: "('a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> bool) \<Rightarrow> ('a \<Rightarrow> 'a) \<Rightarrow> bool"
    where "liftablep r f \<equiv> \<forall> x y. r x y \<longrightarrow> r (f x) (f y)"

lemma liftablepI[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> x y. r x y \<Longrightarrow> r (f x) (f y)"
    shows "liftablep r f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. liftablep r f
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  r ?x ?y \<Longrightarrow> r (f ?x) (f ?y)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. liftablep r f
unfolding liftablep_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  r ?x ?y \<Longrightarrow> r (f ?x) (f ?y)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y. r x y \<longrightarrow> r (f x) (f y)
by simp

lemma liftablepE[elim]:
    assumes "liftablep r f"
    assumes "r x y"
    obtains "r (f x) (f y)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (r (f x) (f y) \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow> thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  liftablep r f
  r x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (r (f x) (f y) \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow> thesis
unfolding liftablep_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x y. r x y \<longrightarrow> r (f x) (f y)
  r x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (r (f x) (f y) \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow> thesis
by simp

lemma liftablep_rtranclp:
    assumes "liftablep r f"
    shows "liftablep r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. liftablep r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* f
proof

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y \<Longrightarrow> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* (f x) (f y)
fix x y

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y \<Longrightarrow> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* (f x) (f y)
assume "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y"

proof (state)
this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y.
       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y \<Longrightarrow> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* (f x) (f y)
thus "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* (f x) (f y)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* (f x) (f y)
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y
  liftablep r f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* (f x) (f y)
by (induct rule: rtranclp_induct, force+)

proof (state)
this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* (f x) (f y)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

definition confluentp :: "('a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> bool) \<Rightarrow> bool"
    where "confluentp r \<equiv> \<forall> x y1 y2. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1 \<longrightarrow> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2 \<longrightarrow> (\<exists> z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z)"

lemma confluentpI[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> x y1 y2. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1 \<Longrightarrow> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2 \<Longrightarrow> \<exists> z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z"
    shows "confluentp r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. confluentp r
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?x ?y1.0; r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?x ?y2.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z.
                       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?y1.0 z \<and>
                       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?y2.0 z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. confluentp r
unfolding confluentp_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?x ?y1.0; r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?x ?y2.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z.
                       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?y1.0 z \<and>
                       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?y2.0 z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y1 y2.
       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1 \<longrightarrow>
       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2 \<longrightarrow>
       (\<exists>z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z)
by simp

lemma confluentpE[elim]:
    assumes "confluentp r"
    assumes "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1" "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2"
    obtains z
    where "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z" "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z.
        \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z; r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  confluentp r
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z.
        \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z; r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
unfolding confluentp_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x y1 y2.
     r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1 \<longrightarrow>
     r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2 \<longrightarrow>
     (\<exists>z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z)
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z.
        \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z; r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

lemma confluentpI'[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> x y1 y2. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1 \<Longrightarrow> r x y2 \<Longrightarrow> \<exists> z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z"
    shows "confluentp r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. confluentp r
proof

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y1 y2.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1; r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z.
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and>
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
fix x y1 y2

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y1 y2.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1; r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z.
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and>
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
assume "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1" "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2"

proof (state)
this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y1 y2.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1; r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z.
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and>
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
thus "\<exists> z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z"

proof (prove)
using this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y2
  \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?x ?y1.0; r ?x ?y2.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z.
                       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?y1.0 z \<and>
                       r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* ?y2.0 z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
by (induct rule: rtranclp_induct, force+)

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma transclp_eq_implies_confluent_imp:
    assumes "r1\<^sup>*\<^sup>* = r2\<^sup>*\<^sup>*"
    assumes "confluentp r1"
    shows "confluentp r2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. confluentp r2
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  r1\<^sup>*\<^sup>* = r2\<^sup>*\<^sup>*
  confluentp r1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. confluentp r2
by force

lemma transclp_eq_implies_confluent_eq:
    assumes "r1\<^sup>*\<^sup>* = r2\<^sup>*\<^sup>*"
    shows "confluentp r1 \<longleftrightarrow> confluentp r2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. confluentp r1 = confluentp r2
using assms transclp_eq_implies_confluent_imp

proof (prove)
using this:
  r1\<^sup>*\<^sup>* = r2\<^sup>*\<^sup>*
  \<lbrakk>?r1.0\<^sup>*\<^sup>* = ?r2.0\<^sup>*\<^sup>*;
   confluentp ?r1.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> confluentp ?r2.0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. confluentp r1 = confluentp r2
by metis

definition diamondp :: "('a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> bool) \<Rightarrow> bool"
    where "diamondp r \<equiv> \<forall> x y1 y2. r x y1 \<longrightarrow> r x y2 \<longrightarrow> (\<exists> z. r y1 z \<and> r y2 z)"

lemma diamondpI[intro]:
    assumes "\<And> x y1 y2. r x y1 \<Longrightarrow> r x y2 \<Longrightarrow> \<exists> z. r y1 z \<and> r y2 z"
    shows "diamondp r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. diamondp r
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>r ?x ?y1.0; r ?x ?y2.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z. r ?y1.0 z \<and> r ?y2.0 z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. diamondp r
unfolding diamondp_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>r ?x ?y1.0; r ?x ?y2.0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z. r ?y1.0 z \<and> r ?y2.0 z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y1 y2.
       r x y1 \<longrightarrow>
       r x y2 \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>z. r y1 z \<and> r y2 z)
by simp

lemma diamondpE[elim]:
    assumes "diamondp r"
    assumes "r x y1" "r x y2"
    obtains z
    where "r y1 z" "r y2 z"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z.
        \<lbrakk>r y1 z; r y2 z\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  diamondp r
  r x y1
  r x y2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z.
        \<lbrakk>r y1 z; r y2 z\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
unfolding diamondp_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x y1 y2.
     r x y1 \<longrightarrow>
     r x y2 \<longrightarrow> (\<exists>z. r y1 z \<and> r y2 z)
  r x y1
  r x y2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>z.
        \<lbrakk>r y1 z; r y2 z\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
by blast

lemma diamondp_implies_confluentp:
    assumes "diamondp r"
    shows "confluentp r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. confluentp r
proof (rule confluentpI')

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y1 y2.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1; r x y2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z.
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and>
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
fix x y1 y2

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y1 y2.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1; r x y2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z.
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and>
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
assume "r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1" "r x y2"

proof (state)
this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1
  r x y2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y1 y2.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1; r x y2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z.
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and>
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
hence "\<exists> z. r y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z"

proof (prove)
using this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1
  r x y2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>z. r y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1
  r x y2
  diamondp r

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>z. r y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
by (induct rule: rtranclp_induct, force+)

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>z. r y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x y1 y2.
       \<lbrakk>r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* x y1; r x y2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>z.
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and>
                            r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
thus "\<exists> z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<exists>z. r y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z
by blast

proof (state)
this:
  \<exists>z. r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y1 z \<and> r\<^sup>*\<^sup>* y2 z

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

locale wellfounded_relation =
    fixes R :: "'a \<Rightarrow> 'a \<Rightarrow> bool"
    assumes wellfounded: "wfP R"
end
